title: PODCAST: Keep on truckin'
description: The economic effects of Brazil's loss, Uber's discounts, and energy efficient trucks.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday July 09, 2014
teaser: The economic effects of Brazil's loss, Uber's discounts, and energy efficient trucks.
contentencoded: How Brazil's huge loss in its World Cup match against Germany could change the flow of public money in the Brazilian economy. Plus, more on citigroup's settlement, as well as Uber's plan to attract new users with lower fares. Also, a look at efforts to create more energy efficient big rigs.
